plugin.name: cometd
plugin.author: Mingfai Ma
plugin.title: Enable your Grails application with Comet functions
plugin.description:
\ Cometd is a scalable HTTP-based event routing bus that uses a Ajax Push technology pattern known as Comet. The term 'Comet' was coined by Alex Russell in his post Comet: Low Latency Data for the Browser.
This plugin provides a SpringCometdServlet and SpringBayeux on top of the Cometd release, and pre-configure the servlet, bayeux instance, and provide all demo programs from the cometd-jetty release.
